title: ## Knowledge Graph Construction from Text: A Reading List (2022 and Earlier
This list covers a range of topics related to knowledge graph construction from text, including
*ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR)*. This paper provides a comprehensive overview of knowledge graph construction techniques, including data sources, extraction methods, and evaluation metrics
**Knowledge Graph Embeddings: A Survey of Approaches and Applications**
*IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering*. This survey focuses on knowledge graph embedding techniques, which represent entities and relations as vectors in a low-dimensional space
**Knowledge Graph Construction from Text: A Survey** by
*ACM SIGKDD Explorations Newsletter*. This survey provides a detailed overview of knowledge graph construction from text, covering various techniques and challenges

author.particle: Challenges in Building Large-Scale Knowledge Graphs by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2014 ACM International Conference on Management of Data*. This paper discusses the challenges of building large-scale knowledge graphs, including data quality, scalability, and semantic heterogeneity

title: *ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR)*. This survey provides a comprehensive overview of relation extraction techniques, including traditional methods and deep learning approaches
**Distant Supervision for Relation Extraction: A Survey**
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2009 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing*. This paper explores the use of distant supervision for relation extraction, which leverages existing knowledge bases to automatically label training data

author.particle: Neural Relation Extraction with Multi-Level Attention by

title: *Proceedings of the 54th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics*. This paper proposes a neural network model for relation extraction that incorporates multi-level attention mechanisms to improve performance

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2012 Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies*. This survey provides an overview of entity linking techniques, including rule-based methods and machine learning approaches

title: **Entity Linking with Joint Inference over Entities and Relations**
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2011 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing*
note: This paper proposes a joint inference model for entity linking that considers both entities and relations simultaneously.

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2006 Conference on Human Language Technology*. This survey provides a comprehensive overview of entity linking techniques, including traditional methods and machine learning approaches

author.particle: Translating Embeddings for Modeling Multi-relational Data by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 26th Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems*. This paper introduces TransE, a knowledge graph embedding model that represents entities and relations as vectors in a low-dimensional space

author.particle: Knowledge Graph Embedding by Translating on Hyperplanes by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 29th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*. This paper proposes TransH, an extension of TransE that uses hyperplanes to represent relations

author.particle: Learning Embeddings for Knowledge Base Completion by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2013 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing*. This paper introduces a neural network model for knowledge graph embedding that learns representations of entities and relations

author.particle: Evaluating Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Link Prediction by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 30th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*. This paper proposes a comprehensive evaluation framework for knowledge graph embedding models, including metrics for link prediction and knowledge base completion

author.particle: of Knowledge Graph Evaluation Metrics by

title: This survey provides an overview of evaluation metrics for knowledge graphs, including metrics for completeness, consistency, and quality

author.particle: Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Question Answering by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2014 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing*. This paper demonstrates the use of knowledge graph embeddings for question answering, where the embeddings are used to find relevant entities and relations

author.particle: Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Recommender Systems by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 28th ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management*. This paper explores the use of knowledge graph embeddings for recommender systems
note: where the embeddings are used to capture user preferences and item attributes.

author.particle: Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Drug Discovery by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 2020 ACM International Conference on Information
title: This paper demonstrates the use of knowledge graph embeddings for drug discovery, where the embeddings are used to identify potential drug targets and predict drug-target interactions

author.particle: Knowledge Graph Embeddings for Personalized Search by

container-title: *Proceedings of the 44th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research & Development in Information Retrieval*. This paper explores the use of knowledge graph embeddings for personalized search, where the embeddings are used to capture user interests and search intent

*Proceedings of the 36th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence*. This paper explores the use of knowledge graph embeddings for explainable AI, where the embeddings are used to provide insights into the reasoning behind AI predictions

title: This list provides a starting point for exploring the vast literature on knowledge graph construction from text
container-title: You can find more articles by searching online databases such as ACM Digital Library, IEEE Xplore, and Google Scholar
